name: Spicy Vietnamese Sausage & Pepper Skillet
step_by_step: Slice sausage on the bias 5 mm thick
Julienne bell pepper and thin-slice onion
Heat wok to smoking, 1 tbsp oil
Sear sausage 2 min until edges caramelize
Add aromatics: chili, onion, stir 30 s
Toss in bell pepper, 1 tsp sugar, 1 tbsp fish sauce, splash water
Cook 3 min until peppers blister but stay crisp
Push mixture to side, crack egg, fry 90 s runny
Finish with squeeze of lime, scatter tomato for freshness
Serve sizzling with crusty baguette or rice
